mag Module Reference

all routines related to the filaments acting as magnetic flux tubes are in this module More...

Functions/Subroutines

subroutine setup_mag ()
 sets up the magnetic field and check there are no conflicting options arguments set in run.in
subroutine mag_tension (i, u)
 simulate the effect of the lorentz force by adding in magnetic tension to velocity calculations


subroutine B_diffusion ()
 use greens function for diffusion operator to smooth the field use a 5 point footprint, can be done in one or three dimensions in one dimension this is given by

in three dimensions the 2 in the denominator is an 8 select this in run.in

subroutine B_ts
 print time series information for the magnetic field
subroutine print_full_B (filenumber)
 print full magnetic field information at a particular timestep

Variables

logical diffusion_on = .false.

Detailed Description

all routines related to the filaments acting as magnetic flux tubes are in this module

Variable Documentation

logical mag::diffusion_on = .false.
Parameters:
diffusion_on a flag set on if diffusion had been set to a none zero value in run.in, this helps subsequent smoothing routine
